text: Jack Thompson (23 August 1927 – 7 December 1961) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He died after being shot by his de facto partner in December 1961. == Notes == == External links == * Category:1927 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:1961 deaths
title: Jack Thompson (Australian footballer)
